title: Trump family to launch US Bitcoin mining venture with Hut 8
summary: The Trump family is partnering with crypto firm Hut 8 to launch American Bitcoin Corp., a new Miami-based venture focused on Bitcoin mining and building strategic Bitcoin reserves
description: The Trump family is partnering with crypto firm Hut 8 to launch American Bitcoin Corp., a new Miami-based venture focused on Bitcoin mining and building strategic Bitcoin reserves
